text: albus_dumbledore I should have known that you would be here ... Professor mcgonagall .
professor_mcgonagall Good evening , Professor dumbledore . Are the rumours true , albus ?
albus_dumbledore I 'm afraid so , Professor . The good , and the bad .
professor_mcgonagall And the boy ?
albus_dumbledore hagrid is bringing him .
professor_mcgonagall Do you think it wise to trust hagrid with something as important as this ?
albus_dumbledore Ah , Professor , I would trust hagrid with my life .
hagrid Professor dumbledore , Sir . Professor mcgonagall .
albus_dumbledore No problems , I trust , hagrid ?
hagrid No , sir . Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol . Heh . Try not to wake him . There you go .
professor_mcgonagall albus , do you really think its safe , leaving him with these people ? I 've been watching them all day . They 're the worst sort of Muggles imaginable . They really are .
albus_dumbledore The only family he has .
professor_mcgonagall This boy will be famous . There wo nt be a child in our world who does n't know his name .
albus_dumbledore Exactly . He 's better off growing up away from all that . Until he is ready .
albus_dumbledore There , there , hagrid . It 's not really good - bye , after all .
albus_dumbledore Good luck ... harry Potter .
aunt_petunia_dursley Up . Get up .
dudley_dursley Wake up , cousin ! We 're going to the zoo !
aunt_petunia_dursley Oh , here he comes , the birthday boy !
uncle_vernon_dursley Happy birthday , son .
aunt_petunia_dursley Why do n't you just cook the breakfast , and try not to burn anything .
harry_potter Yes , Aunt petunia .
aunt_petunia_dursley I want everything to be perfect for my dudley 's special day .
uncle_vernon_dursley Hurry up ! Bring my coffee , boy !
harry_potter Yes , Uncle vernon .
dudley_dursley How many are there ?
uncle_vernon_dursley Thirty - six . Counted 'em myself .
dudley_dursley Thirty - six ? ! But last year last year I got thirty - seven ! !
uncle_vernon_dursley Yes , well , some of them are quite a bit bigger than last year !
dudley_dursley I do n't care how big they are !
aunt_petunia_dursley Oh , now , now , now . This is what we 're going to do , is that when we go out we 're going to buy you two new presents ! How 's that , Pumpkin ?
aunt_petunia_dursley This will be a lovely day at the zoo . I 'm really looking forward to it .
uncle_vernon_dursley I 'm warning you now , boy . Any funny business , any at all , and you wo n't have any meals for a week . Get in .
dudley_dursley Make it move .
uncle_vernon_dursley Move !
dudley_dursley MOVE !
harry_potter He 's asleep !
dudley_dursley He 's boring .
harry_potter Sorry about him . He does n't understand what it 's like , lying there day after day , having people press their ugly faces in on you .
harry_potter Can you ... hear me ? I see . That 's me as well . I never knew my parents , either .
dudley_dursley Mummy , dad , come here ! You wo n't believe what this snake is doing ! !
dudley_dursley Whoa ! Ahh ! Ahh ! !
snake Thankssssssss .
harry_potter Anytime .
man SNAKE !
dudley_dursley Mum , mummy !
aunt_petunia_dursley AHH !
dudley_dursley Mum , help ! Help me !
aunt_petunia_dursley My darling boy ! How did you get in there ? !
harry_potter .
aunt_petunia_dursley It 's all right . It 's all right .
harry_potter Ow !
uncle_vernon_dursley What happened ?
harry_potter I swear I do n't know ! One minute the glass was there and then it was gone ! It was like magic !
uncle_vernon_dursley There 's no such thing as magic !
uncle_vernon_dursley Ah , Marge is ill . Ate a funny whelk .
dudley_dursley Dad , look ! harry 's got a letter ! !
harry_potter Hey , give it back ! It 's mine !
uncle_vernon_dursley Yours ? Who 'd be writing to you ?
uncle_vernon_dursley No more mail through this letterbox .
aunt_petunia_dursley Have a lovely day at the office , dear .
uncle_vernon_dursley Shoo ! Go on !
uncle_vernon_dursley Fine day Sunday . In my opinion , best day of the week . Why is that , dudley ?
harry_potter No sir , not one blasted , miserable .
dudley_dursley AHH ! Make it stop ! Please make it stop !
aunt_petunia_dursley and vernon .
uncle_vernon_dursley Go away , ahh !
dudley_dursley What is it ? Please tell me what 's happening !
uncle_vernon_dursley Give me that ! Give me that letter !
harry_potter Get off ! Ahh !
uncle_vernon_dursley Ahh !
harry_potter They 're my letters ! Let go of me !
uncle_vernon_dursley That 's it ! We 're going away ! Far away ! Where they ca n't find us !
dudley_dursley Daddy 's gone mad , has nt he ? !
harry_potter Make a wish , harry .
uncle_vernon_dursley Who 's there ? Ahh !
hagrid Sorry 'bout that .
uncle_vernon_dursley I demand that you leave at once , Sir ! You are breaking and entering !
aunt_petunia_dursley Ooh .
hagrid Dry up , Dursley , you great prune .
all Ahh !
hagrid Mind , I have n't seen you since you was a baby , harry , but you 're a bit more along than I would have expected . Particularly ' round the middle !
dudley_dursley I I I 'm not harry .
harry_potter appears I I am .

hagrid Oh , well , of course you are ! Got something for ya . ' Fraid I might have sat on it at some point ! I imagine that it 'll taste fine just the same . Ahh . Baked it myself . Words and all . Heh .
harry_potter Thank you !
hagrid It 's not every day that your young man turns eleven , now is it ?
harry_potter Excuse me , who are you ?
hagrid Rubeus . Keeper of keys and grounds at Hogwarts . Course , you 'll know all about Hogwarts .
harry_potter Sorry , no .
hagrid No ? Blimey , harry , did n't you ever wonder where your mum and dad learned it all ?
harry_potter Learnt what ?
hagrid You 're a wizard , harry .
harry_potter I I 'm a what ?
harry_potter A wizard . And a thumping good one at that , I 'd wager . Once you train up a little .
harry_potter No , you 've made a mistake . I ca n't be ... a - a wizard . I mean , I 'm just ... harry . Just harry .
hagrid Well , Just harry , did you ever make anything happen ? Anything you could n't explain when you were angry or scared ? Ah .
dudley_dursley .
harry_potter Dear , Mr. Potter . We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts ' School of witchcraft and Wizardry !
uncle_vernon_dursley Hell not be going ! We swore when we took him in we d put an end to this rubbish !
harry_potter You knew ? ? You knew all along and you never told me ?

aunt_petunia_dursley Of course we knew . How could you not be ? My perfect sister being who she was . Oh , my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter . We have a witch in the family . Is n't it wonderful ? I was the only one to see her for what she was . A freak ! And then she met that Potter , and then she had you , and I knew you 'd be just the same , just as strange , just as ... abnormal . And then , if you please , she went and got herself blown up ! And we got landed with you .
harry_potter Blown up ? You told me my parents died in a car crash !
hagrid A car crash ? A car crash kill James and Lily Potter ?
aunt_petunia_dursley We had to tell him something .
hagrid It 's an outrage ! It 's a scandal !
uncle_vernon_dursley He 'll not be going !
hagrid Oh , and I suppose a great Muggle like yourself 's going to stop him , are you ?
harry_potter Muggle ?

hagrid Non magic folk . This boy 's had his name down ever since he was born ! He 's going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world , and he 'll be under the greatest headmaster Hogwarts ' has ever seen albus dumbledore .
uncle_vernon_dursley I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks !
hagrid Never insult albus dumbledore in front of me .
dudley_dursley Ahh !
all Ahh !
harry_potter .
hagrid Oh , um , I 'd appreciate if you did n't tell anyone at Hogwarts about that . Strictly speaking , I 'm not allowed to do magic .
harry_potter Okay .
hagrid .
harry_potter all students must be equipped with ... one standard size two pewter cauldron and may bring if they desire either an owl , a cat or a toad . Can we find all this in London ?
hagrid If you know where to go .
bartender_in_leaky_cauldron tom Ah , hagrid ! The usual , I presume ?
hagrid No thanks , tom . I 'm on official Hogwarts business today . Just helping young harry here buy his school supplies .
tom Bless my soul . It 's harry Potter .
man Welcome back , Mr. Potter , welcome back .
witch Doris Crockford , Mr. Potter . I ca n't believe I 'm meeting you at last .
professor_quirrell harry P - potter . ca n't tell you how pleased I am to meet you .
hagrid Hello , Professor . I did n't see you there . harry , this is Professor quirrell . He 'll be your Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts .
harry_potter Oh , nice to meet you .
professor_quirrell F - fearfully fascinating subject . N - not that you need it , e - eh , Potter ? Heheh .
hagrid Yes , well , must be going now . Lots to buy . Heh .
harry_potter Good - bye .
hagrid See , harry , you 're famous !
harry_potter But why am I famous , hagrid ? all those people back there , how is it they know who I am ?
hagrid I 'm not exactly sure I 'm the right person to tell you that , harry .
hagrid Here 's where you 'll get your quills and ink , and over there all your bits and bobs for doing your wizardry .
boy It 's a world class racing broom . Look at it , its the new Nimbus 2000 ! It 's the fastest model yet .
harry_potter But , hagrid , how am I to pay for all this ? I have n't any money .
hagrid Well there 's your money , harry . Gringotts , the Wizard Bank . T'aint no place safer , ' cept perhaps Hogwarts .
harry_potter Uh , hagrid , what exactly are those things ?
hagrid They 're goblins , harry . Clever as they come goblins but not the most friendly of beasts . Best stick close to me . Mr. harry Potter wishes to make a withdrawal .
goblin_bank_teller And does Mr. harry Potter have his key ?

hagrid Oh . Wait a minute . Got it here somewhere . Hah . Here 's the little devil . Oh , and there 's something else as well . Professor dumbledore gave me this . It 's about you - know - what in vault you - know - which .
goblin_bank_teller Very well .
griphook Vault 687 . Lamp , please .
hagrid Did n't think your mum and dad would leave you with nothing , now didja ?
griphook Vault 713 .
harry_potter What 's in there , hagrid ?
hagrid Ca n't tell you , harry . It 's Hogwarts business . Very secret .
griphook Stand back .
hagrid Best not mention this to anyone , harry .
harry_potter I still need ... a wand .
hagrid A wand ? Well , you 'll want ollivanders . No place better . Run along there , but wait . I just got one more thing I got to do . Wo n't be long .
harry_potter Hello ? Hello ?
mr_ollivander I wondered when I 'd be seeing you , Mr. Potter . It seems only yesterday that your mother and father were in here buying their first wands . Well , give it a wave .
harry_potter Oh !
mr_ollivander Apparently not . Curious , very curious .
harry_potter Sorry , but what 's curious ?

mr_ollivander I remember every wand I 've ever sold , Mr. Potter . It just so happens that the phoenix , whose tail feather resides in your wand gave one other feather , just one . It is curious that you should be destined for this wand when its brother gave you that scar .
harry_potter And ... who owned that wand ?

mr_ollivander Oh , we do not speak his name . The wand chooses the wizard , Mr. Potter . It 's not always clear why , but I think it is clear that we can expect great things from you . After all , He - Who - Must - Not - Be - Named did great things ... terrible , yes , but great .
hagrid harry ! harry ! Happy birthday !
harry_potter Wow .
hagrid You all right , harry ? You seem very quiet .
harry_potter He killed my parents , did n't he ? The one who gave me this . You know , hagrid , I know you do .

hagrid First , and understand this , harry , 'cause it 's very important . Not all wizards are good . Some of them go bad . A few years ago there was one wizard who went as bad as you can go . And his name was V- ... .his name was V- ... .
harry_potter Maybe if you wrote it down ?
hagrid No , I ca n't spell it . all right . His name was voldemort .
harry_potter voldemort ?
hagrid Shh ! !

hagrid It was dark times , harry , dark times . voldemort started to gather some followers , brought 'em over to the dark side . Anyone that stood up to him ended up dead . Your parents fought against him , but nobody lived once he decided to kill 'em .
harry_potter Me ? voldemort tried to kill ... me ?
hagrid Yes . That ai n't no ordinary cut on your forehead , harry . A mark like that only comes from being touched by a curse ... and an evil curse at that .
harry_potter What happened to Vo- ... to You - Know - Who ?

hagrid Some say he died . Codswallop in my opinion . Nope , I reckon he 's out there , still , too tired to go on . But one thing 's absolutely certain . Something about you stumped him that night . That 's why you 're famous , harry . That 's why everbody knows your name . You 're the boy who lived .

hagrid What 're you looking at ? Blimey , is that the time ? ? Sorry , harry , I 'm gon na have to leave you . dumbledore'll be wanting his ... well , he 'll be wanting to see me . Now , uh , your train leaves in 10 minutes . Here 's your ticket . Stick to it , harry that 's very important . Stick to your ticket .
harry_potter Platform 9 ¾ ? But hagrid , there must be a mistake . This says Platform 9 ¾. There 's no such thing ... is there ?

trainmaster Right on your left , ma'am .

professor_mcgonagall Welcome to Hogwarts . Now , in a few moments , you will pass through these doors and join your classmates . But before you can take your seats you must be sorted into your houses . They are Gryffindor , Ravenclaw , Hufflepuff , and Slytherin . Now , while you are here , your house will be like your family . Your triumphs will earn you house points . Any rule breaking , and you will lose points . At the end of the year , the house with the most points is awarded the house cup .
neville_longbottom Trevor !
professor_mcgonagall The sorting ceremony will begin momentarily .

professor_mcgonagall We 're ready for you now .

Also , our caretaker , Mr. filch has asked me to remind you that the 3rd floor corridor on the right hand side is out of bounds to everyone who does not wish to die a most painful death . Thank you .

professor_snape There will be no foolish wand waving or silly incantations in this class . As such , I do n't expect many of you to enjoy the subtle science and exact art that is potion making . However , for those select few Then again , maybe some of you have come to Hogwarts in possession of abilities so formidable that you feel confidant enough to not ... pay ... attention .
professor_snape Mr. Potter . Our ... new ... celebrity . Tell me , what would I get if I added powdered root of asphodel to an infusion of wormwood ?
harry_potter I do n't know , Sir .
professor_snape And what is the difference between Monkshood and Wolfbane ?
harry_potter I do n't know , Sir .
professor_snape Pity . Clearly , fame is n't everything , is it , Mr. Potter ?

harry_potter Hey , ron , somebody broke into Gringotts . Listen , Believed to be the work of dark witches or wizards unknown , Gringotts goblins , while acknowledging the breach , insist that nothing was taken . The vault in question , number 713 , had in fact been emptied earlier that same day . That 's odd . That 's the vault hagrid and I went to .

class Good afternoon , Madam hooch .

madame_hooch Good afternoon , Amanda , good afternoon . Welcome to your first flying lesson . Well , what are you waiting for ? Everyone step up to the left side of their broomstick . Come on now , hurry up . Stick your right hand over the broom and say , Up !
